jbt.execution.core
Class BTExecutorFactory

java.lang.Object
  jbt.execution.core.BTExecutorFactory

public class BTExecutorFactory
extends java.lang.Object

The BTExecutorFactory implements the simple factory pattern, and allows clients of the framework to create instances of IBTExecutor objects that will run specific behaviour trees.

Author:
Ricardo Juan Palma Dur√°n

Method Detail

createBTExecutor

public static IBTExecutor createBTExecutor(ModelTask treeToRun,
                                           IContext context)
Creates an IBTExecutor that is able to run a specific behaviour tree. The input context is also specified.

Parameters:
treeToRun - the behaviour tree that the returned IBTExecutor will run,
context - the input context to be used by the behaviour tree.
Returns:
an IBTExecutor to run the tree treeToRun.

createBTExecutor

public static IBTExecutor createBTExecutor(ModelTask treeToRun)
Creates an IBTExecutor that is able to run a specific behaviour tree. A new empty context is created for the tree.

Parameters:
treeToRun - the behaviour tree that the returned IBTExecutor will run,
Returns:
an IBTExecutor to run the tree treeToRun.
